name: MACAULAY DAD 2016
description:
USE ARROW KEYS

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Mac and I made this game about important things that happened to us in 2016. She drew most of the pictures over the course of the week and told me what they were (FACES, NOTES, MIRRORS, SNOWMEN). When I asked what the game was about, she said it was about "how we are a band" and her only request was to do the music and sound. We worked together on some pictures - I used red, yellow, and blue for everything I made. She scored the game in one take using a Casiotone MT-68 keyboard; I made some small cuts and added some events to match her sound effects.
